snippet: Neil Glat, who assisted in N.F.L. expansion and stadium development in his 15 years working for the league, has joined the Jets as team president.
abstract: New York Jets announce that Neil Glat, who assisted in NFL expansion and stadium development in his 15 years working for the league, will join the Jets as team president.
lead_paragraph: Neil Glat, who assisted in N.F.L. expansion and stadium development in his 15 years working for the league, has joined the Jets as team president.

headline.seo: Jets Name Neil Glat as Team President
